menu: Use this menu to access Analyses, Apps, and Data or to return to the Dashboard from anywhere within the DE.
analyses:
From the Analyses view, you can:

  • Check the status of a launched analysis
  • Access the results of your analysis
  • View the parameters you set for each analysis
  • Relaunch an analysis with the same parameters you previously selected
apps:
From the Apps view, you can:

  • Browse all apps available in CyVerse to analyze your data
  • Customize an existing app
  • Create your own app
data:
From the Data view, you can:

  • Transfer data in/out of CyVerse
  • Access data you own, data shared with you, and public data
  • Share your data with other CyVerse or external users
notifications:
Automated notifications are sent for:

  • The status of your analyses, data transfers, and any requests you have made
  • When file(s) or folder(s) are shared with you or by you
preferences:
From the Settings view, you can:

  • Customize how and when you get notifications
  • Change settings and preferences
  • Create or modify pre-set keyboard shortcuts
bag:
Use a bag to quickly perform bulk operations with Analyses, Apps, and Data:

  • Share Analyses, Apps, and Data from the bag
  • Download multiple datasets from the bag
dashboard:
From the Dashboard, get information about:

  • Your recently launched analyses
  • Your recently used apps
  • New apps available in the DE
  • CyVerse News and Events
search:
Use Search to:

  • Quickly find analyses, apps, and data
  • Filter search results by type
  • View detailed search results (hit the `Enter` key after the search term or select the `View All` option from the results)
support:
Use this in-app chat to:

  • Contact CyVerse Support for issue(s) with the DE or any CyVerse services
  • Ask a question about CyVerse services
  • Get notified about CyVerse planned maintenance, unplanned downtime, and events such as webinars
tourPrompt: Welcome {{user}} to CyVerse! Would you like a quick tour of the Discovery Environment?
dismissPrompt: If you need, you can access the Discovery Environment tour from the help page.
